text.autoconfig.netherchest.title: Nether Chest
text.autoconfig.netherchest.option.allow: If this option is enabled, hoppers will be able
to access the nether chest's inventory
If this option is enabled, hoppers will be able
to pump items into the nether chest's inventory
If this option is enabled, hoppers will be able
to pump items out of the nether chest's inventory
text.autoconfig.netherchest.option.enabl: If this option is enabled, nether chests
can be locked to a specific channel
text.autoconfig.netherchest.option.ignor: If this option is enabled, channel keys are no longer obligated
to have the same NBT in order to be considered equal
Ignore stack size in multichannel mode
If this option is enabled, channel keys are no longer obligated
to have the same stack size in order to be considered equal
text.autoconfig.netherchest.option.chann: Items whose IDs are listed in this field
are banned from becoming channel keys
Only those items whose IDs are listed in this field
can be treated as channel keys
